name: POMPOM MAZE
description:
POMPOM MAZE

EN
Pompom needs to pick the flowers and boxes before the scorpions reach her. She needs about 75 flowers and 3 boxes to get the key to the next level. Each scorpions sting starts the level over again. Keyboard arrows move Pompom through the maze. It works plug and play with some joypads.

PT-BR
Pompom precisa colher as flores e caixas antes que os escorpiões a alcancem. Ela precisa de cerca de 75 flores e 3 caixas para conseguir a chave para o próximo nível. Cada ferroada de escorpião começa o nível novamente. Setas do teclado movem Pompom pelo labirinto. Funciona plug and play com alguns joypads.


Adquira via PIX por R$4,50.
chave: a1d992da-d0dc-41e0-93ea-954cd0ac4909

POMPOM MAZE
Code, design, tests, characters, music and sound effects by Murilo Soares.
